title: description
Mark Ronson & Bruno Mars' Vodka Funk: A freaky variant of the Vodka Milk Punch. As good as Mark Ronson & Bruno Mars' liquor.

title: notes
Mark Ronson & Bruno Mars' Vodka Funk: Vodka, Milk and a dash of something.

title: pairing
Mark Ronson & Bruno Mars' Vodka Funk: Mark Ronson & Bruno Mars have it with a hot Crackers and mille-feuille.

title: serving_suggestion
Mark Ronson & Bruno Mars' Vodka Funk: Shake in iced cocktail shaker & strain. Drink to the fresh sounds of Uptown Funk.
